languages.text: Данные на инфо-банке оказались повреждены, но Вольному Торговцу удалось выяснить — больше информации скрыто в тайных хранилищах Теодоры. Одно из них расположено где-то на мире Кьява Гамма.

traits.locale_text: Данные на дата-банке оказались повреждены, но Вольному Торговцу удалось выяснить — больше информации скрыто в тайных хранилищах Теодоры. Одно из них расположено где-то на мире Кьява Гамма.

languages.text: The data contained in the data-bank was corrupted, but the Rogue Trader learned that more information might be found in Theodora's hidden caches. One of them is located somewhere on Kiava Gamma.
languages.original_text: Данные на инфо-банке оказались повреждены, но Вольному Торговцу удалось выяснить — больше информации скрыто в тайных хранилищах Теодоры. Одно из них расположено где-то на мире Кьява Гамма.

traits.locale_text: The data contained in the database was corrupted, but the Rogue Trader learned that more information might be found in Theodora's hidden caches. One of them is located somewhere on Kiava Gamma.
The data contained in the data-bank was corrupted, but the Rogue Trader learned that more information might be found in Theodora's hidden caches. One of them is located somewhere on Kiava Gamma.
The data contained in the data-bank was corrupted, but the Rogue Trader learned that more information might be found in Theodora's hidden caches. One of them is located somewhere on Kiava Gamma.

languages.text: La banque de données est corrompue, mais {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} a appris que les caches secrètes de Théodora recelaient peut-être davantage d'informations. L'une d'elles se trouve quelque part sur Kiava Gamma.
languages.original_text: The data contained in the data-bank was corrupted, but the Rogue Trader learned that more information might be found in Theodora's hidden caches. One of them is located somewhere on Kiava Gamma.

traits.locale_text: La banque de données est corrompue, mais {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} a appris que les caches secrètes de Théodora recelaient peut-être davantage d'informations. L'une d'elles se trouve quelque part sur Kiava Gamma.

languages.text: 数据库中的数据被破坏了，但行商浪人得知，西奥多拉的秘密藏匿处可能会找到新的数据，其中一处藏匿处位于基亚瓦伽马星。
languages.original_text: The data contained in the data-bank was corrupted, but the Rogue Trader learned that more information might be found in Theodora's hidden caches. One of them is located somewhere on Kiava Gamma.

traits.locale_text: 数据库中的数据被破坏了，但行商浪人得知，西奥多拉的秘密藏匿处可能会找到新的数据，其中一处藏匿处位于基亚瓦伽马星。

languages.text: データバンクのデータは破損していたが、自由開拓者はシオドーラの隠し場所にさらに多くの情報があることを知った。そのひとつがキアヴァ・ガンマのどこかにあるという。
languages.original_text: The data contained in the data-bank was corrupted, but the Rogue Trader learned that more information might be found in Theodora's hidden caches. One of them is located somewhere on Kiava Gamma.

traits.locale_text: データバンクのデータは破損していたが、自由開拓者はシオドーラの隠し場所にさらに多くの情報があることを知った。そのひとつがキアヴァ・ガンマのどこかにあるという。

languages.text: Die Daten auf der Datenbank waren beschädigt. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} hat jedoch erfahren, dass sich in Theodoras Geheimlagern noch mehr Informationen befinden könnten. Eines davon befindet sich irgendwo auf Kiava Gamma.
languages.original_text: The data contained in the data-bank was corrupted, but the Rogue Trader learned that more information might be found in Theodora's hidden caches. One of them is located somewhere on Kiava Gamma.

traits.locale_text: Die Daten auf der Datenbank waren beschädigt. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} hat jedoch erfahren, dass sich in Theodoras Geheimlagern noch mehr Informationen befinden könnten. Eines davon befindet sich irgendwo auf Kiava Gamma.

languages.text: Los datos del banco estaban dañados, pero {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente ha descubierto que podría haber más información en los alijos ocultos de Theodora. El primero de ellos está en algún lugar de Kiava Gamma.
languages.original_text: The data contained in the data-bank was corrupted, but the Rogue Trader learned that more information might be found in Theodora's hidden caches. One of them is located somewhere on Kiava Gamma.

traits.locale_text: Los datos del banco estaban dañados, pero {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente ha descubierto que podría haber más información en los alijos ocultos de Theodora. El primero de ellos está en algún lugar de Kiava Gamma.

languages.text: Veri bankasında bulunan veriler bozulmuş olsa da Hür Tacir, Theodora'nın gizli zulalarından yeni bilgiler edinebileceğini öğrendi. Bunlardan birisi, Kiava Gama'da bir yerde bulunuyor.
languages.original_text: The data contained in the data-bank was corrupted, but the Rogue Trader learned that more information might be found in Theodora's hidden caches. One of them is located somewhere on Kiava Gamma.

traits.locale_text: Veri bankasında bulunan veriler bozulmuştu ancak Hür Tacir, Theodora'nın gizli zulalarından yeni bilgiler edinebileceğini öğrendi. Birisi Kiava Gama'da bir yerde bulunuyor.
